QuestData.Title: HELP!
QuestData.Description: HELP! They're gonna eat me! I just know it!$B$BFind the key, I know it has to be on one of these ogres.$B$BIf you get me out of here, my father will reward you handsomely! He's the leader of Telaar, Arechron.
QuestData.LogDescription: Find the Boulderfist Key and Free Corki. Speak with Arechron in Telaar should you succeed.
QuestData.CompletionText: That boy...$B$B<Arechron shakes his head in disapproval.>$B$BHe'll be the death of me.
QuestData.RewardText: I'm really sorry about this, $r. He's always getting himself into trouble. I just wish I could put a leash on him...
